sub_topic: Calculation of Carnot efficiency of a heat engine
message_1: A heat engine uses a source temperature of 650 K and a sink temperature of 300 K. Calculate the Carnot efficiency of the engine.
message_2:
The Carnot efficiency of a heat engine is given by the formula:

Efficiency = 1 - (T_sink / T_source)

where T_sink is the temperature of the sink and T_source is the temperature of the source. In this case, T_sink = 300 K and T_source = 650 K.

Efficiency = 1 - (300 / 650)
Efficiency = 1 - 0.4615

The Carnot efficiency of the engine is approximately 53.85%.
